Module jfx
Package com.CodeSmell.parser

Class Parser

java.lang.Object
com.CodeSmell.parser.Parser
public class Parser extends Object
The Parser class that reads in the JSON source code of the project that is being analysed and then converts the JSON code to a code property object

    • initializeCPG

      public static CodePropertyGraph initializeCPG(InputStream cpgStream, boolean serializedObject) throws InvalidClassException
      Reads in a .json file to create an initial CodePropertyGraph and then calls methods to obtain missing information and update necessary fields of every element within cpg. Finally, adds relationships to the cpg object and then serializes it into a .json file.
      Parameters:
      cpgStream - - The input stream from JoernServer
      serializedObject - - if true read serialized backup, if false read as joern_query.py standard output
      Returns:
      A CodePropertyGraph object containing the source code classes and all relations
      Throws:
      InvalidClassException

    • writeBackup

      protected static void writeBackup(CodePropertyGraph cpg)

    • updateCPG

      protected static void updateCPG(CodePropertyGraph cpg)
      Update the properties of each CPGClass and additionally add relations and packages to the cpg.
      Parameters:
      cpg -

    • updateCPGClassProperties

      protected static void updateCPGClassProperties(CodePropertyGraph cpg)
      Updates the properties of each CPGClass within the CPG. This includes its inheritFrom list, updating the parent of all of its attributes and methods, updating the type lists of each attribute and parameter, and finally, updating the attribute and method calls of each method.
      Parameters:
      cpg - - The CodePropertyGraph containing the source code information

    • returnMethodCalls
